amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 118-705 to require the President to certify that the PRC and CCP have ceased their oppression of the Tibetan people as a condition of terminating sanctions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
